title: How do you get a Platinum Border?
body:
So i was Platinum from S4 to S7 and gold at S3, but i never got a border, and i want one because they look sexy as. Any help is appreciated. 


https://gyazo.com/7a4a2a96400f831b65c9ed6cdb46a480

replies.body: Were you punished for boosting in those seasons? Such punishments will strip an account of all ranked rewards, including borders, skins, icon etc.

In that case I would recommend submitting a ticket to player support. If you weren't punished for boosting and were the appropriate ranks (Silver+) to get borders, they should have been added to your account each year, support should be able to shed light on why you don't.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
